name: Service Bots
description:
Created for Yogscast Game Jam 2020

Service Bots is a fast-paced food flying experience.
Designed with couch co-op in mind, battle it out to see who can deliver the most amount of food! 
Get an advantage by throwing or eating your food. (It's safe to eat things off the floor right?)

CONTROLS
This game supports up 4 players through controllers. 
The 1st player can use mouse and keyboard if so desired.

Created with Unity 2019.5.9f1.
